name: McPanda: Super Pilot Kids' App
description:
A great open-world game for kids. With this app you can fly exciting missions, experience great adventures, and become a real flying hero. Choose one of the super-cool planes and your favorite pilot. Wow, each aircraft has special abilities that help you solve tasks and missions!

AIRPLANES
► The Flying Racer
The ultimate flying race taxi.

► Speedy Plane
Super agile airplane - perfect to find hidden places and caves.

► Power Firefighting Plane
Boasts a super-powerful water cannon to extinguish even the biggest fire.
Also suitable for taxi jobs.

► Super Duper Jet
It's incredibly fast, smooth, and just amazing to fly.
You can pick up passengers and deliver packages.

► Rescue Chopper
A powerful, giant helicopter that specializes in rescue missions.
It can put out fires, save people, and be used as a taxi.

► Bumblebee Spaceship
Whoa, that’s one not to miss! Are you excited yet?
A totally crazy aircraft.


YOUR MISSIONS
•• Air-Taxi pilot
Pick up passengers and quickly fly them to their destination.

•• Rescue pilot
Rescue injured residents from difficult terrain and fly them to a hospital.

•• Fire service pilot
Put out forest fires in time with the water cannon before they spread.

•• Airmail pilot
Land your aircraft, disembark, and collect parcels. Then take them to the residents’ homes.

•• Tourist guide
Find great attractions and land to take a picture. The better the photo, the more stars you’ll get...

...and the more jobs you complete, the more stars you can collect.


MORE FEATURES
» Walking, swimming, flying
Land wherever you want, jump out, and walk or swim to go exploring!

» Skydiving
Jump off skyscrapers and cliffs, and use your parachute. Try to break the glide record...

» Switching planes
Don’t feel like flying the chopper any longer? Fly over to the jet and switch planes.


WHAT ELSE?
⋅⋅ Explore huge caves and hidden places.
⋅⋅ Fly cool stunts.
⋅⋅ Take the helicopter to rescue people in distress from the water.
⋅⋅ Use the boost to move faster.
⋅⋅ Use the warp portals to find shortcuts.

(One airplane is free to play. More airplanes are available as an in-app purchase.)
